result.arabic_text: ۞ وَيَٰقَوۡمِ مَا لِيٓ أَدۡعُوكُمۡ إِلَى ٱلنَّجَوٰةِ وَتَدۡعُونَنِيٓ إِلَى ٱلنَّارِ
result.translation: 41.Kaadu yi-maraw anu Yallal taamineeniih kay farmoyta Muusal taamineeniih girák naggowtaanamah sin seecak isin girá yoo culussu wayta taamâ fan yoo sectaanaa? Woh mannal takkeeh!
